thread.title: Infographic: Reproductive Rights in the 2016 Presidential Primary

author: BPR Media Team
title: Infographic: Reproductive Rights in the 2016 Presidential Primary
text:
Pin 
Policy decisions surrounding reproductive rights affect over 161 million women living in the United States today, yet the information available to voters is often biased and sensationalized. Use this infographic to learn about leading candidatesâ€™ positions on a range of issues associated with reproductive rights, as well as the implications of those stances. Infographic by Isabela Karibjanian , Hannah Simpson, and Lauren Thomas.
